DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate orally disintegrate tablet sildenafil similar pharmacokinetic property conventional tablet sildenafil .

DOC.criteria: Otherwise healthy male subject age 45 year old without erectile dysfunction . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 32.5 kg/m2 . Signed date informed consent document . Evidence history clinically significant abnormality Have baseline orthostatic hypotension Positive drug screen , excessive alcohol tobacco use
